titleStmt.title: SII 12.139: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 139. (A.R. No. 228 of 1904). ŚIṄGAVARAM, GINGEE TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE LEFT WING-STONE AT THE ENTRANCE INTO THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE RAṄGANĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: The title ‘Āvaniāḷappiṟandāṉ’ is added in the present inscription dated in the 4th year, to the name Sakalabhuvanachakravarttigaḷ Kōpperuñjiṅga. The inscription registers a gift of 30 cows for a perpetual lamp in the temple of Tiruppaṉṟikuṉṟu-Emberumāṉ by Iḷaiyaperumāḷ Vattarāyar son of Tavañcheydāṉ Vattarāyaṉ of Karuvili.

The astronomical details given in the record correspond to A.D. 1246, August 26, Sunday; 53; the nakshatra Tiruvōṇam had, however, ended the previous day and ‘Śravishṭhā’ was current till ·75 on this day.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuva ṉacakravatti kaḷ śrī
Avaniāḷappiṟantāṉ kopperuñciṅkade
varkku yāṇṭu 4Āvatu siṁha nāyaṟṟu pūrva pa
kṣattu nāyaṟṟukkiḻamai trayodaśi yum tiruvo
ṇamum peṟṟa nāḷ tiruppaṉṟikuṉṟu Emperumā
ṉukku karuviliuṭaiyāṉ tavañceytāṉ
vattarāyaṉ makaṉ Āṉa yiḷaiyaperumāḷāṉa vattarāyar vaitta tiru
ṉuntāviḷakku 1- ṉṟukku viṭṭa cāvāmuvāp perumpacu 3 10
Ippacu muppatum kaikkoṇṭom Ikkoyilil vai
kāna[sa*]sūtrattu bhārga vaṉ Āṇṭavaṉ paṉṟiāḻvā
ṉum bhārga vaṉ Ātittavilli paṉṟiāḻvā
ṉ Uḷḷiṭṭārom .[ Ātre] yaṉ Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷaṉ Eḻuttu .
kāṅkayapperaiyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Aṅkarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . muttaḷavaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu .
vikkiramapāṇṭiyapperaiyaṉ Eḻuttu .
paḷḷikkaṭṭuc cetirāyaṉ Eḻuttu .
villavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . campūrāyapperaiyaṉ Eḻuttu .
vāḷavarāyapperaiyaṉ Eḻuttu
kaṇiccipākkamuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu nāṭṭavar paṇiyāl
Irukaimativāraṇa Irācarācappiramarāyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 12.139 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
